examples: Although they struggled to make ends meet, the Johnsons took pride in their children's academic achievements and aspirations.

words.defineVi: một ý chí mạnh mẽ để đạt được một cái gì đó

examples: Viability is the point after which a fetus could survive outside the womb.
And after years of rampant borrowing, the government's financial viability was being wiped out, too.
Now, that's well before the point of viability.
Since 2009, the U.S. Postal Service has been on the U.S. Government Accountability Office's high risk list for financial viability.
Now I'm casting a new spell with a positive message about the vibrancy, vitality and viability of women of all ages.
words.defineEn: the state or quality of being capable of achieving success
words.defineVi: trạng thái hoặc chất lượng có khả năng đạt được thành công

examples: She finally found a place in the sun with the triumph of her latest book.

The American president, George H.W. Bush, declared it a triumph.

words.defineEn: a great victory, success, or achievement gained through struggle
words.defineVi: một chiến thắng vĩ đại, thành công, hoặc thành tựu đạt được thông qua đấu tranh

words.defineEn: data that shows the past performance of an organization, product, or person, often used as a basis of evaluation
words.defineVi: dữ liệu cho thấy hiệu suất trong quá khứ của một tổ chức, sản phẩm hoặc người, thường được sử dụng làm cơ sở đánh giá

examples: maybe, but I think it has the most natural synergy with brownie.

They take the flower and they process it, and they come up with an extract that not only has CBD, but it has other plant chemicals, other cannabinoids, other terpenoids, other things in the plant that work together in this, what's called this herbal synergy, this entourage effect.

You know, any time you bring on someone like a Mars that has just such a broad reach globally has the sort of resources that they can to try to sort of bring these synergies together with their existing portfolio in the chocolate space and try to push that forward.
words.defineEn: the working together of two things (muscles or drugs for example) to produce an effect greater than the sum of their individual effects

examples: Your friend really talks a blue streak!

We got shortchanged, she cursed a blue streak and got our money back.

words.defineEn: any means of advancement that helps one to make progress towards achieving something
words.defineVi: bất kỳ phương tiện tiến bộ nào giúp một người đạt được tiến bộ để đạt được điều gì đó

examples: Both projects are kept on ice until the question of funding is resolved.

I'm afraid this matter shall be resolved at the court of law, my hands are tied in this case.

words.defineEn: a strong will to have or do something of value
words.defineVi: một ý chí mạnh mẽ để có hoặc làm một cái gì đó có giá trị

examples: The old saying proved true - prosperity makes friends and adversity tries them.

words.defineEn: the state of being successful, particularly by earning a lot of money

examples: The prospect of a promotion can be more motivating than the actual responsibilities that come with the job.

words.defineEn: the period during which someone or something is at their best in terms of achieving success or physical state

words.defineVi: phẩm chất kiên trì cố gắng dù khó khăn
